title: Unable to purchase champion (Not enough IP)
body: I've got over 4800 IP and i tried to purchase Talon, says i don't have enough IP, but I can purchase a 3150 champion just fine.

replies.body:
Sometimes your IP balance is inaccurate (at least from what I have seen), if you have just recently purchased something else that would have put you under 4800 IP, but your client says that it is still well above, you're going to be unable to purchase Talon as technically you don't have enough IP. 
I've experienced this when purchasing both Champions and Runes, so even if you haven't bought another Champ lately, if you've bought some Runes that is probably the reason behind it.
